site_name: Development Site At 18A Curzon Street And 4, 5 And 6
description: Variation of condition 1 of listed building consent dated 06 April 2020 (RN: 20/01323) which itself varied condition 1 of planning permission dated 05 July 2019 (RN: 19/04036) for the variation of Condition 1 of listed building consent dated 2 May 2018 (RN: 16/05703) for, 'Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment of site (retaining front facades of 5-6 Stanhope Gate) to provide a building with lower ground, ground and eight upper floors (including plant at part eighth floor level and roof terraces at sixth/seventh/eighth floor levels); includes excavation to provide part sub-basement and three basement levels (in addition to lower ground floor), mechanical plant and associated internal and external works, to make changes to the internal layout at first and fourth floor levels. Namely, to allow the amalgamation of a two-bedroom apartment with the remaining apartment on the first floor.
decision_conditions: Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
DES External works to match existing
Demoition - only as prt of complte dev
DES No plant etc on roof unless on drwgs
